titleInfo.title: Gospels On the front cover: 4 መንገል [4 Gospels] with European 4 and phonetic complementቱ [-tu] of the numeral አርባዕቱ፡ (ʾarbāʿətu – ‘four’);

name.namePart: anonymous monk of the Gundä Gunde Monastery

subject.topic: Bible N.T. John; Bible N.T. Luke; Bible N.T. Mark; Bible N.T. Matthew;
